parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. While the post mentions "Cozma," it does not explicitly refer to a specific parliamentary candidate.  The context suggests it might be about a family with that surname involved in alleged illegal activities, not a political campaign.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and the content is presented as a news story, aiming for a broad audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post appears to be journalistic reporting on alleged criminal activity, not influencing votes in the parliamentary elections. There is no call to action related to voting for or against any candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents itself as a news article with a link to a news website. The style and content are consistent with journalistic reporting, albeit potentially with a sensationalist tone.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; it presents information in a way that attempts to resemble a news report.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1118645849651212</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while politically categorized, does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post focuses on reporting alleged criminal activities involving the Cozma family, not on promoting or discouraging votes for any specific parliamentary candidate.  The lack of any explicit or implicit endorsement of a candidate, combined with the journalistic presentation of the information, suggests that the primary objective is news reporting, not electoral influence.  Although the post is paid advertising, the content itself does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Gazeta de Nord-Vest</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
